Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM _EWA_DEV_CAT WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY DEV_CAT_LVL , DEV_CAT_ORD

Set.Name: OnTreeNodeNew SQL
Set.Sql:
INSERT INTO _EWA_DEV_CAT(DEV_CAT_UID, DEV_CAT_PUID, DEV_CAT_NAME, DEV_CAT_LVL, DEV_CAT_ORD) SELECT @sys_unid, @DEV_CAT_PUID, @DEV_CAT_NAME, A.LVL, B.ORD FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(DEV_CAT_LVL) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(DEV_CAT_LVL) + 1 END LVL FROM _EWA_DEV_CAT WHERE DEV_CAT_UID=@DEV_CAT_PUID) A, (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(DEV_CAT_ORD) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(DEV_CAT_ORD) + 1 END ORD FROM _EWA_DEV_CAT WHERE DEV_CAT_PUID=@DEV_CAT_PUID) B;
SELECT * FROM _EWA_DEV_CAT WHERE DEV_CAT_UID=@sys_unid

Set.Name: OnNew SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO _EWA_DEV_CNT (DEV_CNT_UID, DEV_CAT_UID, DEV_CNT_ADM_ID, DEV_CNT_SUBJECT, DEV_CNT_MEMO, DEV_CNT_KEYWORDS, DEV_CNT, DEV_CNT_CDATE, DEV_CNT_TAG, DEV_CNT_VOD, DEV_CNT_HEAD_PIC) VALUES ( @sys_unid, @DEV_CAT_UID, @G_ADM_ID, @DEV_CNT_SUBJECT, @DEV_CNT_MEMO, @DEV_CNT_KEYWORDS, @DEV_CNT, @SYS_DATE, @DEV_CNT_TAG, @DEV_CNT_VOD, @DEV_CNT_HEAD_PIC)

Set.Name: OnModify SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE _EWA_DEV_CNT SET DEV_CNT_ADM_ID = @g_adm_id, DEV_CNT_SUBJECT = @DEV_CNT_SUBJECT, DEV_CNT_MEMO = @DEV_CNT_MEMO, DEV_CNT_KEYWORDS = @DEV_CNT_KEYWORDS, DEV_CNT = @DEV_CNT, DEV_CNT_MDATE = @SYS_DATE, DEV_CNT_TAG = @DEV_CNT_TAG, DEV_CNT_VOD = @DEV_CNT_VOD, DEV_CNT_HEAD_PIC = @DEV_CNT_HEAD_PIC WHERE DEV_CNT_UID = @DEV_CNT_UID

Set.Name: CheckError SQL
Set.Sql: -- select 不能执行 as EWA_ERR_OUT FROM xxx where 1=2

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM _EWA_DEV_CNT A LEFT JOIN _EWA_DEV_CAT B ON A.DEV_CAT_UID=B.DEV_CAT_UID WHERE A.DEV_Cat_uid=@dev_cat_uid order by dev_cnt_cdate desc

Set.Name: CheckError SQL
Set.Sql: -- select 不能执行/javascript_func() as EWA_ERR_OUT FROM xxx where 1=2

Set.Name: CheckError SQL
Set.Sql: -- select 不能执行 as EWA_ERR_OUT FROM xxx where 1=2

Set.UpSQL: INSERT INTO _EWA_DEV_ATT(DEV_ATT_UID, DEV_CNT_UID, DEV_ATT_PATH, DEV_ATT_NAME,DEV_ATT_DES , DEV_ATT_URL, DEV_ATT_EXT, DEV_ATT_SIZE, DEV_ATT_MD5, DEV_ATT_CDATE) VALUES(newid(), @DEV_CNT_UID, @EWA_UP_PATH, @EWA_UP_NAME,@EWA_UP_LOCAL , @EWA_UP_URL, @EWA_UP_EXT, @EWA_UP_LENGTH, @EWA_UP_MD5, getdate())

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM _EWA_DEV_ATT WHERE DEV_CNT_UID=@DEV_CNT_UID order by DEV_ATT_CDATE DESC

Set.Name: CheckError SQL
Set.Sql: -- select 不能执行/javascript_func() as EWA_ERR_OUT FROM xxx where 1=2

Set.Name: OnNew SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO _EWA_DEV_ATT (DEV_ATT_UID, DEV_CNT_UID, DEV_ATT_DES, DEV_ATT_MEMO, DEV_ATT_PATH, DEV_ATT_NAME, DEV_ATT_SHOW, DEV_ATT_URL, DEV_ATT_EXT, DEV_ATT_SIZE, DEV_ATT_MD5, DEV_ATT_CDATE) VALUES ( @DEV_ATT_UID, @DEV_CNT_UID, @DEV_ATT_DES, @DEV_ATT_MEMO, @DEV_ATT_PATH, @DEV_ATT_NAME, @DEV_ATT_SHOW, @DEV_ATT_URL, @DEV_ATT_EXT, @DEV_ATT_SIZE, @DEV_ATT_MD5, @SYS_DATE)

Set.Name: OnModify SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE _EWA_DEV_ATT SET DEV_ATT_DES = @DEV_ATT_DES, DEV_ATT_MEMO = @DEV_ATT_MEMO, DEV_ATT_EXT = @DEV_ATT_EXT, dev_att_status=@dev_att_status WHERE DEV_ATT_UID = @DEV_ATT_UID

Set.Name: CheckError SQL
Set.Sql: -- select 不能执行 as EWA_ERR_OUT FROM xxx where 1=2
SELECT BAS_TAG, BAS_TAG_NAME, BAS_TAG_HTML_EN FROM BAS_TAG WHERE BAS_TAG_GRP='COM_YES_NO' ORDER BY BAS_TAG_ORD

Set.Name: OnPagePost SQL
Set.Sql: select * from _ewa_dev_att where dev_cnt_uid=@dev_cnt_uid and isnull(dev_att_status,'')!='COM_NO';
